duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead engagements in the Performance Improvement practice, identifying business improvement opportunities and developing executable improvement plans.
Conduct assessments using analytical skills and develop internal controls and organizational metrics dashboards.
Manage and lead continuous process improvement strategies and initiatives.
Deliver training, coaching, and mentorship to Project Champions.
Execute a portion of the scope of work, ensuring deliverables are achieved on time and within budget.
Utilize Lean, Six Sigma, and Performance Improvement tools to enhance productivity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's level degree required. Master’s degree advantageous.
